title: Second Promos to Gold 5 and didn't get a free win.
body:
Today I got back into my Gold 5 promos but the promo helper didn't give me a free win although i got a free win 
for my silver 1 promos. I would like to find out if this is a bug or if it is intentional. I'm not sure but could it be that 
promo helper doesn't give you a free win for going up divisions. Another thing is in the previous promo in one of my games
while in lobby i lost internet which counted as a loss so that could also have affected it.

replies.body: Oh ok, Thanks for your comment. Anyways I got to Gold even with a accidental dodge :)
you don't get free wins on division promos, you just have to win 3 of the 5 my friend :/
